Package index

Transformation functions

Transformation functions for interval data.

ilr()
Isometric Log-Ratio (ILR) transformation for interval responses
inv_ilr()
Inverse Isometric Log-Ratio (ILR) transformation for interval responses
itvl_to_splx()
Convert from interval bounds to simplex
splx_to_itvl()
Convert from simplex to interval bounds
remove_zeros()
Remove Zeros from Simplex

Plotting functions

Plotting functions for interval data.

plot_intervals()
Plot Intervals
plot_intervals_cumulative()
Plot Cumulative Intervals
theme_itm()
Custom ggplot2 Theme for intervalpsych

Model fitting

Fit models to interval responses.

fit_itm()
Fit Item Response Theory Model
extract_consensus()
Extract Consensus intervals from ITM Stan Fit Object
plot_consensus()
Plot ITM Consensus Intervals

Example data

Example data sets for interval data.

quantifiers
Verbal Quantifier Data
